HomePage.title: What's Your Brainrot Type?
HomePage.subtitle: Take the chaotic test and find out what kind of fan-crazed obsession you have
HomePage.description: Discover your unique brainrot personality through our scientifically unhinged quiz. Are you a breakdown type, loop type, or something even more chaotic?

social_media_time.question: How much time do you spend on social media daily?

options.while_eating: I scroll while eating, can't eat without it
options.never_exit: I literally never close the app

content_type.question: What type of content do you consume most?

repetitive_thoughts.question: What phrase loops in your head the most?

options.marry_now: "I need to marry them RIGHT NOW"

character_actions.question: What have you done for your favorite character?

options.dream_and_cry: Dreamed about them and woke up crying
options.write_letters: Written letters I can never send
options.stare_merchandise: Stared at merch for hours after buying

options.no_just_like: "I'm not! I just really like them!"
options.not_worthy: "I'm not even worthy of being called that"

brain_retention.question: If your brain could only keep one thing, it would be:

options.smile_frame: That one frame of them smiling
options.edit_bgm: That edit with the perfect BGM match
options.fanfic_fragment: A paragraph from my unfinished fanfic
options.confession_memory: The memory of crying over their confession scene

fear_words.question: What are you most afraid of hearing?

relationship_type.question: Your relationship with your obsession is like:

typical_comment.question: Which sounds like something you'd post?

options.dialogue_death: "I died when they said that line"
options.brain_occupied: "They live in my brain rent-free and I'm bankrupt"
options.bow_to_writer: "I would bow down to the writers"

options.like_crazy_self: I like who I am when I'm crazy
options.sick_but_real: I'm sick but I've never felt more alive

Results.title: Your Brainrot Type
Results.subtitle: You are the
Results.shareTitle: I took the Brainrot Test and got:

breakdown.name: Breakdown Brainrot
breakdown.description: You're the champion of emotional breakdowns. One cute moment and you're sobbing for hours. Your tears could fill an ocean and you're proud of it.

loop.name: Loop Brainrot
loop.description: You replay the same 3-second clip 1000 times and still want more. That one perfect frame lives rent-free in your head and you're the landlord.

fanfic.name: Fanfiction Brainrot
fanfic.description: You've written 50k words about characters having breakfast. Your imagination is unhinged and your Google Docs are legendary.

academic.name: Academic Brainrot
academic.description: You know their backstory better than the creators. You analyze every gesture like you're defending a PhD thesis on fictional characters.

wedding.name: Wedding Brainrot
wedding.description: You've planned your wedding 500 times and picked out baby names. In your mind, you're already married and living happily ever after.

submission.name: Submission Brainrot
submission.description: You treat their every word like gospel. You've built a shrine in your heart and you worship at the altar of their existence.

yandere.name: Yandere Brainrot
yandere.description: You've started copying their mannerisms and speech patterns. Your personality is 80% them and you're not sorry about it.

chaotic.name: Chaotic Brainrot
chaotic.description: You're not just a fan, you're a content creator, theorist, and unofficial spokesperson. You've transcended obsession and become art.

extreme.name: Extreme Brainrot
extreme.description: You're the ultimate obsession incarnate. Your dedication is so intense it defies human comprehension. You don't just live for this - you ARE this.

About.title: What is Brainrot?
About.subtitle: Understanding the beautiful chaos of online obsession
About.definition: Brainrot refers to the phenomenon where someone becomes so deeply obsessed with online content, fictional characters, or fandoms that it significantly impacts their daily thoughts and behavior.

origins.title: Origins
origins.content: The term 'brainrot' emerged from internet culture, particularly on platforms like TikTok, Twitter, and Tumblr, where users would jokingly describe their intense fixations on content or characters.

types.title: Types of Brainrot
types.content: From emotional breakdown types who cry at every cute moment, to academic types who analyze every detail, brainrot manifests in many forms.

community.title: Community
community.content: Rather than being ashamed, many embrace their brainrot as a form of passionate engagement with content they love. It's become a badge of honor in fan communities.

About.testPurpose: This test helps you identify which type of brainrot you have, celebrating the unique ways people connect with the content they love.

homepage.title: Brainrot Test - What's Your Internet Obsession Type? | Free Personality Quiz
homepage.description: Take our viral Brainrot Test and discover your internet obsession personality type! Are you breakdown, loop, fanfic, or chaotic type? Share your results!

quiz.title: Take the Brainrot Test - Internet Obsession Personality Quiz
quiz.description: Answer 10 questions to discover your brainrot type. Find out if you're a breakdown, loop, fanfic, or another type of internet-obsessed personality.

about.title: What is Brainrot? Understanding Internet Obsession Culture
about.description: Learn about brainrot culture, its origins, and different types of internet obsession. Understand why brainrot has become a celebrated part of online communities.
